findings.title: Add README badges for CI status, npm version, and license
findings.description:
## Description

The project README currently lacks status badges. Add the following badges to the top of README.md:

- CI status badge (GitHub Actions)
- License badge (MIT)
- Node.js version badge (>=22)
- pnpm badge

## Acceptance Criteria
- Badges are displayed at the top of README.md
- All badge links work correctly
- Badges use shields.io format

## Labels
enhancement, good-first-issue

Labels: none

findings.title: docs: Add contribution direction options to README.md
findings.description:
## Summary

The README.md should include a section that describes available options and directions for project contributions that OAC can tackle.

## Details

Currently the README covers installation, usage, and configuration but doesn't guide contributors on **what kinds of contributions** OAC should be directed to solve. We need a section that outlines:

1. **Contribution categories** â bug fixes, feature requests, documentation improvements, refactoring, test coverage, performance optimizatiâ¦
